roleset.name: to cheat, trick out of something
roleset.note: COZEN-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB, and sense groupings. VerbNet entry cheat-10.6-1. Framed by Claire. (from cozen.01-v)

role.descr: Theme, money or possession being taken through trickery
Entity tricked, person/source of thing taken

example.name: With theme as bare NP, source as PP
example.text: He cozened the money out of the old man.

example.name: Opposite syntax: source as NP, theme as PP
example.text: He cozened the Earl of as much as he is worth.
example.arg: of as much as he is worth

roleset.name: to deceive, potentially doop into doing something
roleset.note: COZEN-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB, and sense groupings. VerbNet class force-59. Framed by Claire. (from cozen.02-v)

role.descr: Arg1 is deceived into doing, thinking what?

example.name: All arguments: daddy can I borrow the coach?
example.text: She cozened her father into letting her use the coach.
example.arg: into letting her use the coach.
